text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist and fog in the morning and at night. Light rain later. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
